metadata.description: Letter to the private secretary of Major General Basilio Valdes from Adeudato J. Agbayani requesting General Valdes to go over his manuscript pertaining to notable Foreign Decorations given to Filipinos
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; personal files; letters
metadata.title: Letter to the private secretary of Major General Basilio Valdes from Adeudato J. Agbayani requesting General Valdes to go over his manuscript pertaining to notable Foreign Decorations given to Filipinos
